title: Advice #115
body: Once you find a really good friend don't do anything that could mess up your friendship.

title: Advice #125
body: If you are feeling down, try holding a pencil between your top lip and your nose for five minutes.

title: Advice #45
body: Don't always rely on your comforts.

title: Advice #5
body: Drink a glass of water before meals.

title: Advice #80
body: Everything matters, but nothing matters that much.
